Get $100 in Bonus Bets +$100 off on NFL Sunday Ticket on Launch Day in Kentucky!

Don’t miss out on the FanDuel Kentucky Bonus Code offer HERE. Currently, new FanDuel users in Kentucky are invited to join the action by grabbing up to $100 in bonus bets on Winners and Whiners.

 

Kentucky Pre-Launch: Get $100 in Bonus Bets + $100 Off NFL Sunday Ticket!

Claim Offer
Disclaimer

Kentucky sports fans and prospective bettors are thrilled about the September 28th launch of FanDuel Sportsbook in the state. FanDuel is one of the most well-respected sportsbooks in the country, and its prelaunch promotion has generated a lot of excitement in the Bluegrass state.

The limited-time FanDuel Kentucky bonus code offers new users a $100 bonus bet and a $100 discount on NFL Sunday Ticket. 

 

Here are some College Football games that Kentucky fans may want to lock in on this weekend:

  • Murray State at Louisville
  • Date: Thursday, Sept. 7, 2023
  • Time: 7:30 pm  EST
  • Odds: TBA

 

  • Notre Dame at North Carolina State
  • Date: Saturday, Sept. 9, 2023
  • Time: Noon PM EST
  • Odds: Notre Dame -7.5 O/U 50.5

 

  • Eastern Kentucky at Kentucky
  • Date: Saturday, Sept. 9, 2023
  • Time: 3:00 PM EST

 

  • Texas Longhorns at Alabama Crimson Tide
  • Date: Saturday, Sept. 9, 2023
  • Time: 7:00 PM EST 
  • Odds: Alabama -7 O/U 54.5

Get in the game today with the FanDuel Kentucky Bonus Code offer HERE.

And we can’t forget about some of the key NFL Week 1 matchups: 

  • Detroit Lions vs Kansas City Chiefs
  • Date: Thursday, September 7
  • Time: 8:20 PM ET
  • Odds: KC -5 O/U 53.5

 

  • Cincinnati Bengals vs Cleveland Browns
  • Date: Sunday, September 10
  • Time: 1:00 PM ET
  • Odds: CIN-2.5 O/U 47.5

 

  • Buffalo Bills vs New York Jets
  • Date: Sunday, September 10
  • Time: 8:15 PM ET
  • Odds: Bills -2.5 O/U 46.5

 

FanDuel Kentucky Bonus Code: Get $100 in Bonus Bets +$100 off on NFL Sunday Ticket!

 

FanDuel’s bonus is truly one of the best among the sportsbooks. What makes FanDuel’s offer so exceptional is it is easy to understand, and it is a benefit to everyone who receives it. With FanDuel, new users will receive $100 in Bonus Bets + $100 off on NFL Sunday Ticket, regardless of if their first qualifying bet wins or loses on the first bet. 

I personally love how Fan Duel overall has been to easy to work with. Their customer service is excellent, and they also offer a great variety of payout options. Depositing and making withdrawals are also easy.

FanDuel offers a wide variety of payout and withdrawal options, which includes:

  • Online Banking: 3-5 business days 
  • PayPal/Venmo: up to 48 hours 
  • Debit card: up to 48 hours upon first withdrawal and 24 hours for all subsequent withdrawals 
  • FanDuel Prepaid Play+: up to 24 hours   
  • Cash at Counter withdrawals are typically processed within an hour, but larger withdrawals may take up to 48 hours. You will be notified by email when your cash is ready for pickup. 
  • Check: 7-10 business day 

 

Lock in your NFL, College Football and MLB bets today with FanDuel. This reputable sportsbook has an amazing offer for new bettors to grow their bankroll immediately! Make sure you do not miss out on all the Kentucky prelaunch offers that expire on September 28th.

 

The season is almost here, so make sure you get your FanDuel Kentucky bonus code and save on the NFL Sunday Ticket before it is too late! Claim Offer

 

21+ and present in AZ, CO, CT, IA, IL, IN, KS, LA (permitted parishes only), MD, MI, NJ, NY, OH, PA, TN, VA, WV, or WY. item.content:encoded:
Get $200 in Bonus Bets when signing up in Kentucky!

Grab the Offer Now!

Disclaimer

Kentucky sports betting begins on September 28, but before you place your first wager, Winners and Whiners has partnered with our DraftKings Kentucky Promo Code to provide sports fans in Kentucky with a very special offer to jump into the action.

The DraftKings first-time deposit bonus is very easy to understand. They are offering a $200 bonus bet for new users you make a qualifying bet of at least $5. 

To be eligible for the promotion, new Sportsbook customers must:

  1. Not have previously created a DraftKings Sportsbook account
  2. Be physically located in the Eligible Jurisdiction and obtained the minimum age requirements, and
  3. Successfully sign up for a new DraftKings Sportsbook account during the Promotional Period. Upon completion of the promotional requirements, eligible customers will receive $200 in Bonus Bets to use on the first date and time that DraftKings is permitted to offer sports betting in Kentucky. Bonus Bets paid as eight (8) $25 Bonus Bets.

DraftKings Kentucky Promo Code: Get $200 in Bonus Bets!

The winnings from the first-time deposit bonus can be withdrawn as soon as the bonus bet is settled. This is a very quick turnaround time, and it is one of the best features of this bonus offer.

item.content:encoded:
Kentucky Pre-Launch: Get $100 in Bonus Bets on Launch Day!

BetMGM Kentucky bonus code offer for all MLB, NFL, and College Football bettors allows new bettors in Kentucky to join the action by grabbing up to $100 in bonus bets on Winners and Whiners.

Check out now the best Kentucky sportsbook promos to place a bet on the Louisville Cardinals, Kentucky State, or Western Kentucky this weekend.

Key College Football Matchups of the Week:

  • Murray State at Louisville
    Date: Thursday, Sept. 7, 2023
    Time: 7:30pm EST
  • Eastern Kentucky at Kentucky
    Date: Saturday, Sept. 9, 2023
    Time: 3:00 PM EST
  • Houston Christian at Western Kentucky
    Date: Saturday, Sept. 9, 2023
    Time: 7:00 PM EST

How does the BetMGM Kentucky Bonus Code offer work?

A lot of bettors hear about bonuses, but how does it work? How can this bonus help you as a player?

*For example, if you win your first wager at BetMGM, you get to keep the bet and the profit. It will then become withdrawable cash.

*What happens if I lose my first bet? Your account will be credited with bonus bets which are equal to the amount you wagered. However, if you want to see the full $100 back in bonus bets, you are required to deposit and bet the max of $100. If you deposit and wager just $100 and it fails to win, you’ve accumulated $100 in bonus bets.

So even if you lose, you win! You’ll get a refund in bonus bets equal to whatever you lost, up to $100. Remember that you must use the bonus code WINNERS to claim this offer.

If you are looking to make some money TODAY, check out the picks from HOTTEST CAPPERS in the sports betting industry.

Today’s feature Capper is Mason Folz who is on a RIDICULOUS 21-3 Best Bet Run! Snag his Terrific Tuesday MLB Best Bet for Just $29.

What does the BetMGM Bonus Code mean?

The BetMGM Bonus Code is entitled “WINNERS”, which gets you $100 in Bonus Bets as a new customer.

BetMGM’s “refer a friend” bonus is another option where you can increase your bankroll without placing a bet. You can refer up to 20 friends and each time when one of your friends signs up with BetMGM, both of you will receive $50 in bonus bets.

For you to claim your bonus, your friend will need to make their first deposit and place the $50 of their bonus.

item.content:encoded:
FanDuel Kentucky Promo Code- Get $100 Off on NFL Sunday Ticket

by Arthur Reyes

FanDuel is coming to Kentucky! Do you want to bet on the Kentucky Wildcats this season?

Sign up in Kentucky  for FanDuel Promo Code here   for the opening weekend of College Football and get $100 off on the Sunday NFL Ticket.

 

SEC Champion Prediction: LSU Tigers (+460) @ FanDuel

As has been the case for several seasons, the Southeastern Conference (SEC) is loaded with talented teams in both the East and West divisions. The defending National Champion Georgia Bulldogs (-110) will win the East Division. I then expect Georgia to face the LSU Tigers (+450) in the conference Championship game, with the Tigers prevailing.  

Nov 5, 2022; Baton Rouge, Louisiana, USA; LSU Tigers quarterback Jayden Daniels (5) is tackled by Alabama Crimson Tide defensive lineman DJ Dale (94) and linebacker Chris Braswell (41) during the second half at Tiger Stadium. Mandatory Credit: Stephen Lew-USA TODAY Sports

LSU Quarterback Jayden Daniels will begin his second season under head coach Brian Kelly, and the offensive line should be much stronger than last season. The Tigers’ receiving corps, led by Malik Nabers (wide receiver) and Mason Taylor (tight end ), is one of the conference’s best. LSU has to play Alabama (+240) on the road, but the Tigers will prevail and win the division.  

 

The LSU defense gave up just 22.5 points per game last season and this season is even stronger upfront as Maason Smith is back following a knee injury that left him sidelined for most of the season last year. Linebacker Harold Perkins will create even more problems both against the run and the pass. LSU’s secondary has gone through a huge overall but a pair of transfers will eventually help the unit gel into a strong one after the first few weeks. 

 

Over/Under Win Total Best Bets:

Kentucky Wildcats over 7 

 Kentucky Wildcats scored an average of only 20.4 points per game last season, but with Liam Coen hired as the new play-caller for the Wildcats, Kentucky should see an improvement immediately. In addition, Kentucky landed a talented transfer quarterback when former North Carolina State Wolfpack signal caller Devin Leary decided to become a Wildcat. Kentucky will have to play Mississippi State as well as Alabama in crossover action but faces Vanderbilt and South Carolina, which should result in victories making eight wins a big possibility. 

 

Bet on the Wildcats win total today! Sign up for FanDuel FanDuel Kentucky Promo Code here   and get $100 off on the Sunday NFL Ticket.

 

Texas A&M Aggies over 8 

Texas A&M was one of the nation’s biggest underachievers in 2022 and still has question marks for this season but with coach Bobby Petrino in charge of play calling for head coach Jimbo Fisher, optimism reigns on the offense under quarterback Connor Weigman and wide receiver Evan Stewart. The Texas A&M defense was young and highly talented last season and will improve with experience. If the offense is able to improve, expect to see the Aggies win at least eight games. 

Alabama Crimson Tide Under 10.5 

 Alabama will once again be a highly talented football team in 2023 but the quarterback position remains unsettled. Last season, Alabama won 10 games during the regular season but beat Texas by just one point; beat Texas A&M by only four points; and defeated Ole Miss by just six points. This season Alabama will have new coordinators including offensive coordinator Tommy Reese, while Kevin Steele is the defensive coordinator.  


Sleeper: Tennessee Volunteers +1,500 to win SEC @FanDuel

The Tennessee Volunteers finished last season No.1 in the nation in scoring with an average of 46.1 points per game. Quarterback Joe Milton takes the reins this season in Knoxville, and the Volunteers will have each of their top three running backs returning, including Jabari Small, Jaylen Wright, and Dylan Sampson, who combined to rush for 5.6 yards per carry with 29 touchdowns on the ground. Tennessee does not leave the state except for a visit to Florida through the first 6 weeks of the regular season. Tennessee will face either Alabama or Georgia in the SEC title game if the Volunteers make it that far, and stranger things have happened.

 

If you are looking to bet on College Football this season, follow the Hottest Cappers on WinnersandWhiners.com and head over to our Sportsbook page for bonus codes and more offers. Also check out our Notre Dame season preview, Pac-12 Preview, and Conference USA Preview for free!

 

And remember with FanDuel you can get take $100 off NFL Sunday Ticket.

21+ and present in AZ, CO, CT, IA, IL, IN, KS, LA (permitted parishes only), MD, MI, NJ, NY, OH, PA, TN, VA, WV, or WY. FanDuel is offering online sports wagering in Kansas under an agreement with Kansas Star Casino, LLC. First online real money wager only. $10 Deposit req. Refund issued as nonwithdrawable bonus bets which expire 14 days after receipt. Restrictions apply. See full terms at fanduel.com/sportsbook. Gambling Problem? Call 1-800-GAMBLER or visit FanDuel.com/RG (CO, IA, MI, NJ, OH, PA, IL, TN, VA), 1-800-NEXT-STEP or text NEXTSTEP to 53342 (AZ), 1-888-789-7777 or visit ccpg.org/chat (CT), 1-800-9-WITH-IT (IN), 1-800-522-4700 or visit ksgamblinghelp.com (KS), 1-877-770-STOP (LA), visit www.mdgamblinghelp.org
